title: Delicate Diamond-Studded Gold Bangles (Gaajulu)
features: These elegant bangles feature a minimalist design with delicate gold bars connected by diamond-studded clover motifs. The smooth Hyderabadi polish lends a radiant sheen to the gold. The subtle diamond setting allows for comfortable daily wear while adding a touch of sophistication.
colors: Warm gold with sparkling white diamonds.
occasions: or as a subtle statement piece for festive occasions. Can also be gifted for birthdays or anniversaries.
description: These bangles offer a contemporary take on traditional South Indian jewelry. The lightweight design ensures comfortable wear, while the high-quality diamonds and gold provide lasting value. The minimalist aesthetic makes them versatile for any outfit.
